directions: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add red bell pepper, onion, carrot, and garlic; cook and stir until lightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add mushrooms; cook for 1 minute.

Transfer red bell pepper mixture to a pot. Add mixed beans, diced tomatoes with juice, chili powder, flax seeds, cumin, oregano, and black pepper; stir well. Bring to a boil; simmer uncovered, stirring occasionally, until flavors combine, about 30 minutes.
ingredients: ½ cup chopped red bell pepper
1 ½ cups canned diced tomatoes, with juices
title: Special Vegan Chili
